headline.main: Ancelotti Probed on Future After Champions League Exit
headline.print_headline: Ancelotti Probed on Future After Champions League Exit

docs.snippet: Real Madrid coach Carlo Ancelotti fended off questions about his future after the Champions League holders were dumped out in the semi-finals by Juventus 3-2 on aggregate on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Real Madrid coach Carlo Ancelotti fended off questions about his future after the Champions League holders were dumped out in the semi-finals by Juventus 3-2 on aggregate on Wednesday.

headline.main: United Airlines to Lease Up to 25 Used Aircraft From AerCap Holdings
headline.print_headline: United Airlines to Lease Up to 25 Used Aircraft From AerCap Holdings

docs.snippet: United Continental Holdings Inc on Wednesday announced plans to lease up to 25 used aircraft from AerCap Holdings NV to reduce its dependence on smaller, 50-seat jets....
docs.lead_paragraph: United Continental Holdings Inc on Wednesday announced plans to lease up to 25 used aircraft from AerCap Holdings NV to reduce its dependence on smaller, 50-seat jets.

headline.main: Man Convicted of Hurling Daughter, 4, Off California Cliff in 2000
headline.print_headline: Man Convicted of Hurling Daughter, 4, Off California Cliff in 2000

docs.snippet: A man who prosecutors say hurled his 4-year-old daughter off a 120-foot (37-meter) cliff by the Pacific Ocean nearly 15 years ago was convicted on Wednesday of murder, following a third trial in the case....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man who prosecutors say hurled his 4-year-old daughter off a 120-foot (37-meter) cliff by the Pacific Ocean nearly 15 years ago was convicted on Wednesday of murder, following a third trial in the case.

headline.main: Utah Man Gets 25 Years to Life for Punching Baby to Death
headline.print_headline: Utah Man Gets 25 Years to Life for Punching Baby to Death

docs.snippet: A Utah man who pleaded guilty to aggravated murder for punching and squeezing to death the baby daughter of his girlfriend in an act of frustration was sentenced on Wednesday to 25 years to life in prison, prosecutors said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Utah man who pleaded guilty to aggravated murder for punching and squeezing to death the baby daughter of his girlfriend in an act of frustration was sentenced on Wednesday to 25 years to life in prison, prosecutors said.

headline.main: LLOG Plans Drilling in U.S. Gulf Near Blown Out BP Well
headline.print_headline: LLOG Plans Drilling in U.S. Gulf Near Blown Out BP Well

docs.snippet: LLOG Exploration, a privately-held oil and gas company focussed on deepwater in the Gulf of Mexico, plans to drill a well into the block near where BP Plc's Macondo well ruptured in 2010, causing the worst offshore oil spill in U.S. history....
docs.lead_paragraph: LLOG Exploration, a privately-held oil and gas company focussed on deepwater in the Gulf of Mexico, plans to drill a well into the block near where BP Plc's Macondo well ruptured in 2010, causing the worst offshore oil spill in U.S. history.

headline.main: Va. Man Wrongfully Convicted of Attempted Rape Is Pardoned
headline.print_headline: Va. Man Wrongfully Convicted of Attempted Rape Is Pardoned

docs.snippet: Gov. Terry McAuliffe on Wednesday pardoned a Virginia man who has spent 29 years in prison for an attempted rape that authorities now say he did not commit....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Terry McAuliffe on Wednesday pardoned a Virginia man who has spent 29 years in prison for an attempted rape that authorities now say he did not commit.

headline.main: White House and Labor Advocates Praise Move by Facebook for Higher Wages
headline.print_headline: Reddit Sets New Rules on Harassment

docs.snippet: Facebook announced on Tuesday that it would require its contractors and vendors to provide better benefits and a minimum hourly wage of $15....
docs.abstract: Facebook announced on Tuesday that it would require its contractors and vendors to provide better benefits and a minimum hourly wage of $15.

headline.main: Six Gadgets to Take on a Road Trip

docs.snippet: Stuck in a car for days? Bring along navigation aids, headphones, broadband access, video and music storage — even access to a remote camera to check on your home....
docs.lead_paragraph: Stuck in a car for days? Bring along navigation aids, headphones, broadband access, video and music storage — even access to a remote camera to check on your home.

headline.main: Dead Cubs Prompt State to Ban Chocolate as Bear Hunt Bait
headline.print_headline: Dead Cubs Prompt State to Ban Chocolate as Bear Hunt Bait

docs.snippet: New Hampshire officials on Wednesday banned the use of chocolate as bait starting next season after four bears were found dead at one bait site last fall....
docs.lead_paragraph: New Hampshire officials on Wednesday banned the use of chocolate as bait starting next season after four bears were found dead at one bait site last fall.

docs.snippet: Shake Shack reported a surprise quarterly profit and better-than-expected revenue, and raised their full year outlook. Stocks closed mostly lower. Bobbi Rebell reports....
